## Johns Hopkins Coursera Course Reproducible Research
## Peer Assessment Assignment 1
This assignment makes use of data from a personal activity monitoring device.

### Read the data file
```{r, echo = TRUE}

act_data <- read.csv("activity.csv")
# open libraries
# library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
```


### Question 1 
1.1 Make a histogram of the total number of steps taken each day.

```{r, echo = TRUE}
act_data$date <- as.Date(act_data$date)
act_data$steps <- as.double(act_data$steps)
qplot(act_data$date, y=act_data$steps, geom="histogram", binwidth = 61, stat="identity",
      xlab = "Date", ylab = "Total steps per day", 
      main = "Total Number Of Steps Taken Each Day")
```
